alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Western Alachua; Western Marion (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 07 at 8:31AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Alachua and northwestern Marion Counties through 900 AM EDT... At 831 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Rochelle, or 10 miles south of Gainesville, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Citra, Hawthorne, Archer, Cross Creek, Newnans Lake, Rochelle, Micanopy, McIntosh, Flemington and Lochloosa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Western Alachua; Western Marion
